column4: I'm usingn mount wrong can someone please help? here's a paste of what i've done: http://rafb.net/p/mrP6Qg13.html
what are you trying to mount? iso, cd, hard drive........?
after 'loop' you should be entering a file path eg  mount -o loop /path/to/my/iso/my_iso_game.iso
done that, still not working tho
show me the exact command
http://rafb.net/p/mrP6Qg13.html
that doesnt look like a file path to me
do i need to add a file path if the console is already working in that directory?
then you need            sudo mount -o loop ./"Warcraft III - The Frozen Throne [Disk 1].iso" /Desktop/lol/
ahh cool thanks :) i'll try that
laserbeak43@Moonbase1:~/Desktop$ sudo mount -o loop "Warcraft III - The Frozen Throne [Disk 1].iso"
where is the iso saved?
the desktop
sudo mount -o loop ./"Warcraft III - The Frozen Throne [Disk 1].iso" ~/Desktop/lol
copy and paste that whole command
i did before, i'll try it again
assuming there is a folder on the desktop called 'lol'
i got no response so that means everything worked?
yes
i'll save that. thanks :)
your welcome
